sentence.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination is a tumor suppressor that regulates DNA repair by homologous recombination.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Germline mutations in double-strand break repair via homologous recombination are associated with increased risk of breast and ovarian cancer and double-strand break repair via homologous recombination deficient tumors are exquisitely sensitive to poly (ADP-ribose) polymerase (PARP) inhibitors.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Lack-of-function mutations in deadenylation-independent decapping of nuclear-transcribed mRNA were detected in double-strand break repair via homologous recombination/2-mutation-negative breast cancer cases, suggesting a role in breast cancer susceptibility.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
